title: Global industrial robot market : key companies by related revenue 2017
yAxis: Industrial robot revenue in million euros
summary: This is a bar chart representing Companies in the x axis and Industrial robot revenue in million euros in the y axis.

The minimum Companies KUKA has got 5.68 times less Industrial robot revenue in million euros than the maximum Companies ABB.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Companies in the x axis and Industrial robot revenue in million euros in the y axis.
Companies ABB has the highest Industrial robot revenue in million euros and KUKA has the lowest Industrial robot revenue in million euros.
Companies Omron has the second highest value for Industrial robot revenue in million euros.

Companies KUKA, and Yaskawa have the same Industrial robot revenue in million euros.
